title: What is the relationship between graphology and magnetism in the world of science and how did the experiments of magnetic practitioners change the perception of these phenomena?
first_phrase: In this final part, the author discusses the relationship between graphology, the study of handwriting, and the concept of how handwriting reflects a person’s character. The late Mr. Varinard, who had recently passed away, had dedicated a remarkable study to this topic. The author then shifts to the death of Daniel Dunglas Home and the acceptance of the scientific community of his mediumship. The author argues that the acceptance of his abilities was due to the efforts of sincere practitioners who challenged the prejudices that surrounded magnetism in the past. The potential of magnetic states to be induced in anyone is also discussed.
content: Ce résultat, que les plus ardents prosélytes osaient à peine entrevoir il y a quinze ans, est dû, il faut en convenir, au grand courant de propagande provoqué par les expériences publiques des magnétiseurs praticiens. C’est donc bien à turt que les médecins et certains savants jettent la pierre à ces hommes sincères,qui les premiers ont osé s’attaquer aux préjugés qui environnaient le magnétisme comme une haie de broussailles ; ils devraient au contraire leur savoir gré d’avoir, par leur courageuse initiative, appelé l’attention du monde savant sur des phénomènes trop négligés jusqu’alors. Jusqu’à ces dernières années, on n’était pas fixé sur la possibilité de produire l’état magnétique sur tout le monde, ou seulement sur un nombre restreint de sujets maladifs.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the success of magnetic therapy is owed to the courage and initiative of sincere practitioners who defied societal prejudices and generated public interest. Thanks to their experiments, it is now proven that magnetic sensitivity is an innate aptitude that is not necessarily tied to illness, and cannot be induced through mere goodwill. Despite occasional initial failures, many individuals exhibit highly developed magnetic sensitivity in subsequent sessions.
